channel.title: 🏢 Institute of Artificial Intelligence, Beihang University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Institute of Artificial Intelligence, Beihang University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Improving Adversarial Robust Fairness via Anti-Bias Soft Label Distillation
item.description: Boosting adversarial robustness fairness in deep neural networks, Anti-Bias Soft Label Distillation (ABSLD) adaptively adjusts soft label smoothness to reduce error gap between classes.
